mosinstall.name: eventCal Upcoming
mosinstall.author: Carsten Nikiel
mosinstall.description: eventCal - The Event Calendar System for Joomla! - Upcoming Events Module

param.name: howManyEvents
param.label: How many events to show
param.description: The amount of upcoming events to be displayed

param.name: catid
param.label: Categories
param.description: Comma-separated list of eventCal categories. Events from all categories will be shown if this is empty.

param.name: noUpcomingEvents
param.label: Text if no upcoming events
param.description: Text which will be displayed if no upcoming events could be found

param.name: dateFormat
param.label: Date Format
param.description: Format the {date} wild-card will be substituted by.

param.name: template
param.label: template
param.description: Template for one single entry inside the module-table. You may use title, date, desc, color and cattitle included into {brackets}.
